DOC.brief_summary: PF-04620110 novel compound propose treatment Type 2 diabetes mellitus . The purpose study characterize safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics follow single oral dose .
DOC.brief_title: A Single Dose Study Of PF-04620110 In Overweight And Obese , Otherwise Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year Body Mass Index ( BMI ) approximately 27 35 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) .
DOC.keyword: Single Ascending Dose Study Overweight subject
